name: Eric Bana
description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?

key_work.title: Spotlights: Eric Bana
key_work.brief_description: Eric Banadinović AM, known professionally as Eric Bana, is an Australian actor. He began his career in the sketch comedy series Full Frontal (1993–97) before gaining notice in the comedy/drama The Castle (1997) before gaining critical acclaim as the lead in Chopper (2000).
